text: Decimiana elliptica is a species of praying mantis in the genus Decimiana in the order Mantodea. The type specimens were collected from the Chapanda Diamantina Mountain Range in Bahia, northeastern Brazil, near a mountain known as Morro do Pai Inácio. ==References== Category:Acanthopidae Category:Insects described in 2012 Category:Insects of Brazil
title: Decimiana elliptica
